name: To the Afterlife
description:
"To the Afterlife" is a 2D game made by 3 young students attending UE in Berlin. 

The game was made for a class named "Game & Play". It focuses on our Main Character, Julia, and her  adventure throughout the 5 stages of grief before advancing to the afterlife after her death.

The game is mostly finished, we wish we could add a few more things but time has run short, hopefully you enjoy what we could do and leave a comment regarding your experience with our final project!
